did.unittitle: H. H. Markworth letter to General Rosencrans

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: H. H. Markworth wrote to General Rosencrans the misconduct seen by the First Lieutenant of one of the Captains tearing the muster rolls and refusing Markworth his salary until he obtains the Captain a furlough. He includes evidence of his enlistment and duty during term of service.
